quotes.quote: I don't expect congratulations for successful beginning, what I want is the applaud at successful ending.
Success comes to those who deserve it. Congratulations!
Wishing you both the happily ever after you deserve. Congratulations on your wedding day!
Congratulations... Footprints on the sands of time are not made by sitting down.
Congratulations on the start of something beautiful ! Much love, health and happiness to you on this happy occasion.
Congratulations on your new job! May God's guidance and wisdom be with you in all your endeavors.
May today's success be the beginning of tomorrow's achievements. Congratulations!
Congratulations to a beautiful couple. Wishing you a wonderful journey as you build your new life together.
Your perseverance and your sure belief in your ability has led you to success. Congratulations!
Congratulations! I knew that if someone could do it, then it must be you. Well done my friend!
Well done and congratulations! The fruit of your labor is sweet, and I must say you deserve it.
Curious that we spend more time congratulating people who have succeeded than encouraging people who have not.
When congratulations are in order, I like to wait until they're out of order to offer a high five or enthusiastic pat on the back.
Congratulations is the civility of envy.
The biggest bore of all is he who is overflowing with congratulations.
Congratulations, you have a sense of humor. And to those who didn't: Go stick your head in the mud.
If you woke up breathing, congratulations! You have another chance.
We have a problem. 'Congratulations.' But it's a tough problem. 'Then double congratulations.'
Congratulations on your promotion! Before you go, would you like to take this knife out of my back? You'll probably need it again.
Congratulations to both of you,  and let's get on with the grandchildren.
I am delighted to add my voice to the chorus of well wishers.
I congratulate you on this happy and memorable occasion.
I could not let such a memorable occasion pass without sending you my heartfelt congratulations.
To a person whose life has been an inspiration and whose accomplishments have been outstanding.
Congratulations, all our dreams can come true. If we but have the strength and tenacity to pursue them.
Compliments of congratulation are always kindly taken, and cost one nothing but pen, ink, and paper.
It is time for us all to stand and cheer for the doer. the achiever--the one who recognizes the challenge and does something about it.
I replied congratulations with kind thank yous.. For the most part I kept my mouth shut and worked hard.
The moment was to have several rounds of heartiest congratulations and best wishes all around; with tears of celestial happiness rolling down the cheeks.
These were the same hands that perpetually entwined with his in applause and congratulations; everytime he emerged humanitarianly triumphant; amongst a pack of asphyxiating worldly wild wolves,
Congratulations for a scene like this! / The olden times are here—these shall be olden / When, years to come, remembering present bliss / We sigh for past Papyrian dinners golden.
We ain't supposed to be here, never thought we'd see it / Now we livin' proof, tell the world to believe it / Congratulations, thank God we made it.
I dreamed it all ever since I was young / They said I wouldn't be nothing / Now they always say, 'congratulations'  / Worked so hard, forgot how to vacation.
Congratulations to someone / Someone who's happy with you / I guess he did the right things / I was wise enough to do.
I thought you'd love me forever / Somehow it just couldn't be / Congratulations to someone / But I wish that someone was me.
Congratulations, now you are free / You have earned your degree / Yeah, you've graduated / This is your last separation from me.

Congratulations on your achievement. With every accomplishment, there is an end. With every end there is always a new beginning. Life continually moves from a beginning... to an end...to a new beginning.
Congratulations. I knew the record would stand until it was broken.
The biggest reward for a thing well done is to have done it.
Allow me to offer my congratulations on the truly admirable skill you have shown in keeping clear of the mark. Not to have hit once in so many trials, argues the most splendid talents for missing.
The news of the discovery spread fast all over the country, and inquisitive enquiries mingled with congratulations from this moment became the daily programme.
You're wiser than your last mistake. Congratulations!
Congratulations dear on the start of something best and beautiful!
When someone says, 'I recognize you,' I'll say, 'Congratulations on having a TV.' It's a little joke.
I was overwhelmed by so many interviewers and then messages of congratulations. So many congratulation messages. I feel this shows the authority and the greatness of the Nobel Prize.
To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.

If the day and the night are such that you greet them with joy, and life emits a fragrance like flowers and sweet-scented herbs, is more elastic, more starry, more immortal -- that is your success. All nature is your congratulation . . .
Congratulations on holding the line this year, ... We appreciate the efforts your department has had to make to stay under budget.
